content.rendered:
Speakers, details, registration, and more are all now live for the 2016 Brand Nieuwe Conference in Amsterdam on June 20 – 21.

A few things:
1) Early-bird pricing will only be available for one month, ending on April 15.
2) Between speakers, sponsor-reserved tickets, and pre-sale registrants there are already over 135 seats taken, we have a big theater so let’s fill ’er up!
(Loving the international range of people coming so far: United Arab Emirates, Belgium, France, Belgrade, Czech Republic, Germany, Israel, Norway, Peru, UK, and even US.)
3) An explanation of this year’s logo and identity can be found here.

Hope to see many of you there.

Many thanks to all the sponsors who signed up for launch: MailChimp, GF . Smith, Cerovski, Fontsmith, and Event Compression Group.

PS. Due to some server and @font-face issues yesterday with the BNConf website, I lost a couple of hours of my day which unfortunately translates into lack of time to write a Review today. Noted and Linked posts coming up and a fresh Review tomorrow.
